question: I have had pain at differing levels for so long I can't remember and I'm only 37 (female) with three children.  Twins age 8 yrs - had gestational diabetes but no problems.  Back and neck and headache pain daily.  Can't sleep without meds.  Hate popping pills everyday just to sleep. Can't take during day so I can take care of kids but am cranky cause I hurt.  Not over weight.  Try to stay fit.  Have had two car accidents over the years.  Tried chiropractic, physical therapy, acupunture, massage, cortisone shots in spine and in muscle over the years.  Nothing lasts.   XRAYS  show some curvature. First MRI of thoracic only showed bone compression. Second MRI showed two Posterior disc bulging c5-6 and c6-7.   Have tremendous pain in mid back.  Could this be a result of this disc bulge and what can be done?
title: cervical issues
